snippet: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Sunday the Palestinian militant group Hamas had violated its own offer of a 24-hour humanitarian truce in Gaza....

headline.print_headline: Israel's Netanyahu Says Hamas Has Violated Its Own Cease-Fire: CNN
headline.main: Israel's Netanyahu Says Hamas Has Violated Its Own Cease-Fire: CNN

lead_paragraph: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Sunday the Palestinian militant group Hamas had violated its own offer of a 24-hour humanitarian truce in Gaza.
